definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: I'll order a special messenger to deliver the document.
sentences.chinese: 我会派专人把文件送去。

sentences.english: Community and semi-private bathrooms are cleaned by staff approximately once a week.
sentences.chinese: 社区和非私人浴室每周有专人打扫一次。

sentences.english: Customers who do sub-specialized personnel to follow up.
sentences.chinese: 做到客户分人跟进专人专管。

sentences.english: Set tough targets for each one, and hold people accountable for results.
sentences.chinese: 为每一项改进制定硬指标，并派专人负责。

sentences.english: Village arrange a fixed time feeding in large swan.
sentences.chinese: 村里安排专人在固定时间喂食大天鹅。

sentences.english: The evaporator also only used by briefed persons, you have to wear safety glasses.
sentences.chinese: 蒸发器也由专人使用，必须戴防护眼镜。

sentences.english: We went to a teppanyaki restaurant where they cook in front of you.
sentences.chinese: 我们去了一家有专人为你现场烘烤的铁板烧餐厅。

sentences.english: The City of Calabasas had their own photographer, but they needed some time before we could have the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 市政府有专人摄影，可是需要时间才能拿到。

sentences.english: The matter is vital, make sure to ask someone special to handle it.
sentences.chinese: 这件事很重要，必须请托专人办理。

sentences.english: After being used, there should be the special staff to maintain it.
sentences.chinese: 卷扬机投入使用后，应设专人负责维修保养。

sentences.english: When the drama ended, someone especially assigned for the task let down the curtain.
sentences.chinese: 这场话剧演出一结束，就有专人放下了帲幪。

sentences.english: Our specialists will provide detail information and catalogues for your reference.
sentences.chinese: 我们定当派专人与阁下联络，并提供更详尽的资料。

sentences.english: The note was delivered by hand.
sentences.chinese: 这封短信经由专人送交。

sentences.english: The regulation requires the banks to assign case-specific personnel in charge of returning the telecom fraud money.
sentences.chinese: 规定要求银行指定专人负责电信诈骗资金返还工作。

sentences.english: Finance arrangements for staff for the company to solve the problem.
sentences.chinese: 该公司财务科安排专人负责解决问题。

sentences.english: Did the department manager arrange someone to guide you on your first work day?
sentences.chinese: 在你上岗第一天，部门经理是否为你安排专人带班？

definition: to fix a time/fixed time/timed (of explosive etc)
to be in charge of/to take responsibility for/to be to blame/conscientious
(of a security guard etc) to be on duty, keeping an eye on things/to keep watch
at set dates/at regular intervals/periodic/limited to a fixed period of time/fixed term
to guard a pass/to check on sth
special duty/assigned full time to a task
